content.question: Which of the following describes Landsmanâ€™s overall argument in the excerpt?

choices.label: The Middle Colonies differed from French colonies because they depended on Native American commerce.
The Middle Colonies were similar to each other because they developed plantation agriculture.
The Middle Colonies were more different from each other than the English colonies in other regions.
The Middle Colonies faced similar challenges in governing diverse colonists after they became English.

content.answer: The Middle Colonies faced similar challenges in governing diverse colonists after they became English.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
